scripts.install:all: pnpm --prefix src/TotalFisc.UI install && dotnet restore TOTALFISC.sln
scripts.build: pnpm run build:ui && pnpm run build:api
scripts.clean: find . -name "node_modules" -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name "bin" -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name "obj" -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name "dist" -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' +
